title: Europeans Focus on Ukraine, Navarro Slams India for Buying Russian Oil | The Opening Trade 8/18
content: The Opening Trade has everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. With analysis you won't find anywhere else, we break down the biggest stories of the day and speak to top guests who have skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.  (Source: Bloomberg)
author: Bloomberg
